# BUGSRAD INPUT FILE
# McClatchey Tropical
#
# 
# The profiles below are specified on LAYERS (which have physical thickness).  All quantities (except Pupper) are taken at the middle of the layer.
# Pupper is the pressure of the upper boundary of the layer.  Cloud & Rain quantities are mass mixing ratios.
# CloudFraction is the fraction cloudiness of the layer.  It is applied to all the cloud & precip quantities.
#
# Nlayers
  32

#  
#  This last line specifies scalar quantities
#  mu0 is the cosine of the solar zenith angle
#  alvdr is the surface albedo for visible, direct light
#  alvdf is the surface albedo for visible, diffuse light
#  alndr is the surface albedo for near-infrared, direct light
#  alndf is the surface albedo for near-infrared, diffuse light
#  co2 is the (constant) co2 mixing ratio in parts-per-million
#  ch4 is the (constant) ch4 mixing ratio in parts-per-million
#  n2o is the (constant) n2o mixing ratio in parts-per-million
#   Psurf      Tsurf      mu0       alvdr   alvdf   alndr   alndf   co2         ch4       n2o
#   Pa         K                                                    ppm         ppm       ppm
